scripts.build: node scripts/build.js && mkdir build/static/css/static && cp -r build/static/media build/static/css/static && sed -i 's/,e.respondWith(f)/;try{e.respondWith(f)}catch(error){}/g' build/sw.js
scripts.copy-fonts: node node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js node_modules/framework7-icons/fonts/*.* src/fonts && node node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js node_modules/material-design-icons/iconfont/*.{eot,ttf,woff,woff2} src/fonts
scripts.postinstall: npm run copy-fonts && cp node_modules/preact/dist/preact.min.js public/ && cp node_modules/preact-compat/dist/preact-compat.min.js public/ && cp patch/react-component-el.js node_modules/framework7-react/runtime-helpers/react-component-el.js && cp patch/list-input.js node_modules/framework7-react/components/
